name: compact-vscode
description: Language support for Compact smart contract language (Midnight network)

compact.lsp.path.description: Path to the compact-lsp binary. If empty, the extension will try to find it automatically.

compact.lsp.trace.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: bun run compile && bun run build:server
scripts.pretest: bun run compile && bun run lint
scripts.build:server:linux: cd submodules/compact-lsp && cargo build --release && cp target/release/compact-lsp ../server/linux/compact-lsp
scripts.build:server:darwin: cd submodules/compact-lsp && cargo build --release && cp target/release/compact-lsp ../server/darwin/compact-lsp
scripts.build:server:win32: cd submodules/compact-lsp && cargo build --release && cp target/release/compact-lsp.exe ../server/win32/compact-lsp.exe
